comment.author: 92149915@N08
comment._content: George was a 24 year old carter at the time he enlisted on the 12th of July 1915. He was living at 23 Nowranie Street, Summer Hill, NSW . Information on the third entry of this document He was recommended for and was awarded the Military Medal. He survived the war and returned to Australia on the 5th of March 1919 as per here (link broken - site is under maintenance)

comment.author: 32300107@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/92149915@N08] Thank you for adding these details and the links to the documents - some really good information plus great to learn that he survived the war.
